word: Jesus will appear as their advocate, to plead in their behalf before God. \93If any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous.\94 [1 John 2:1.] \93For Christ is not entered into the holy places made with hands, which are the figures of the true; but into Heaven itself, now to appear in the presence of God for us.\94 \93Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him, seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them.\94  [Hebrews 9:24; 7:25.]
